comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: From Wikipedia: "Moses Alexander (November 13, 1853 – January 4, 1932) was the second elected Jewish governor of a US state, serving as the 11th Governor of Idaho from 1915 until 1919. He was Idaho's first and so far only Jewish Governor."

comment.author: 50087332@N00
comment._content: This is a photo I took a year ago of Gov. Moses Alexander's grave in Boise, Idaho. bit.ly/tBoHOS

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: bior:  Thanks for pointing us to Alexander's full name.  We'll include it in the description next time we update.
